pages.title: Embracing the Night
pages.text: The path to vampirism is irreversible. A willing sacrifice must be made, for once you take your first drink of blood, you will be reborn.

pages.title: Requirements
pages.text: - Be bitten by a vampire and die, OR \n- Drink a **Bottle of Vampire Blood** and perish.

pages.title: The Turning
pages.text: Upon death, you will awaken as a vampire. You must feed within **a few days** or your body will reject the transformation, causing permanent death.

pages.title: Vampiric Weaknesses
pages.text: Newly turned vampires will suffer **sunlight burns** unless they obtain a **Blessed Daylight Ring**. Beware of **Vervain Potions**, as they are deadly.

pages.title: Vampiric Powers
pages.text: Unlock supernatural strength, speed, and blood magic through the **Vampire Skill Tree**.
